name: Lottery Ticket
description: Randomly receive silver coins
description_schinese: 随机获得银币

name: Wood Ticket
description: Randomly obtain wood
description_schinese: 随机获得木材

name: Stone Ticket
description: Randomly obtain stone materials
description_schinese: 随机获得石材

name: Attribute Material Ticket
description: Randomly receive attribute materials
description_schinese: 随机获得属性材料

name: Mineral Ticket
description: Randomly receive ores
description_schinese: 随机获得矿石

name: Advanced Material Ticket
description: Randomly receive advanced materials
description_schinese: 随机获得高级材料

name: Bullet Ticket
description: Randomly receive Lv.1-3 bullets
description_schinese: 随机获得1到3级子弹

name: Advanced Bullet Ticket
description: Randomly receive Lv.4-5 bullets
description_schinese: 随机获得4到5级子弹

name: Weapon Attachment Ticket
description: Randomly receive Lv.1-3 attachments
description_schinese: 随机获得1到3级配件

name: Advanced Weapon Attachment Ticket
description: Randomly receive Lv.4-5 attachments
description_schinese: 随机获得4到5级配件

name: Medicine Ticket
description: Randomly receive medicines
description_schinese: 随机获得药物

name: Food Ticket
description: Randomly receive food
description_schinese: 随机获得食物

name: Blue and White Plum Vase
description: Classic blue and white porcelain pattern, slender bottle body, white background with blue and white. Moderate height, excellent individual display effect.
description_schinese: 经典青花瓷图案，修长瓶身，白底蓝花。高度适中，单独陈列效果佳。

name: Amber Glass Vase
description: Transparent amber color, simple and modern design. Can insert simulated floral materials to enhance the display effect.
description_schinese: 透明琥珀色，简约现代造型。可插入仿真花材增加展示效果。

name: Black Pottery Ancient Ding
description: The antique bronze ware is shaped like a tripod, thick and antique. Suitable for the central position of display cabinets.
description_schinese: 仿古青铜器造型，三足鼎立，厚重古朴。适合展示柜正中央位置。

name: Small Thinker Statue
description: Classic sculpture reproduction, black plaster material, full of artistic atmosphere.
description_schinese: 经典雕塑复刻版，黑色石膏材质，充满艺术气息。

name: Abstract Art Ornament
description: Modern metal sculpture, geometric shape, silver reflective material. Contrasting with classical style.
description_schinese: 现代金属雕塑，几何造型，银色反光材质。与古典风格形成对比。

name: Soaring Eagle
description: Outstretched wings, symbolizing freedom
description_schinese: 展翅造型，象征自由

name: Dormant Dragon
description: Coiled posture, symbolizing strength
description_schinese: 盘绕造型，象征力量

name: Elegant Swan
description: Curved neck, symbolizing purity
description_schinese: 弯颈造型，象征纯净

name: Ballerina Music Box
description: Pink velvet decoration, built-in rotating ballerina.
description_schinese: 粉色绒面装饰，内置旋转芭蕾舞者。

name: Vintage Gramophone Model
description: Black rubberwood shell, brass horn, exquisite singing arm design. Although it is a decoration, the details are perfectly restored.
description_schinese: 黑色胶木外壳，黄铜喇叭，精致的唱臂设计。虽为装饰品，但细节完美还原。

name: Golden Coin
description: "In ancient legends, this coin once belonged to a legendary Steam collector. It is said that in the dead of night, it emits a faint golden glow within the inventory, bringing good luck and bountiful trading profits to its holder."
description_schinese: "在古老的传说中，这枚金币曾属于一位传奇的Steam收藏家。据说每当夜深人静时，它会在库存中发出微弱的金色光芒，为持有者带来好运和丰厚的交易收益。"

name: Starlight Crystal
description: "This crystal is said to be a pure energy crystallization extracted from the core of an ancient game server. Under specific lighting angles, countless tiny gameplay scenes can be seen flowing within, like a microcosm of the entire digital world."
description_schinese: "这颗水晶据说是从古老的游戏服务器核心中提取的纯净能量结晶。在特定的光线角度下，可以看到无数个微小的游戏画面在其中流动，就像整个数字世界的缩影。"

name: Legendary Code Sword
description: "A virtual sword forged by a legendary developer, its blade is constructed from pure code with green digital rain flowing across its edge. Only true digital collectors can sense the powerful aura it radiates."
description_schinese: "由传奇开发者亲自锻造的虚拟之剑，剑身由纯粹的代码构成，剑刃上流淌着绿色的数字雨。只有真正的数字收藏家才能感受到它散发的强大气场。"

name: Ancient Game Design Manuscript
description: "This yellowed manuscript records the complete design philosophy of a lost game. The edges of the paper bear the marks of time, and the creator's soul seems to linger within the ink. Rumor has it that those who read it will gain a unique aesthetic sense for games."
description_schinese: "这份泛黄的手稿记录着某款失传游戏的完整设计理念。纸张边缘有着时间的痕迹，墨迹中似乎还残留着创作者的灵魂。有传言说阅读它的人会获得独特的游戏审美能力。"

name: Mechanical Core Gear
description: "The physical incarnation of the digital platform's iconic gear, forged from bronze and mysterious alloys. Whenever the system updates, this gear automatically turns once, emitting a mesmerizing mechanical sound. Engineers say it contains the operational logic of all platform functions."
description_schinese: "数字平台标志性齿轮的物理化身，由青铜和神秘合金锻造。每当系统更新时，这个齿轮都会自动转动一圈，发出令人着迷的机械音。工程师们说它包含了所有平台功能的运行逻辑。"

name: Midnight Collector Insignia
description: "A mysterious insignia that only manifests in the dead of night when server load is at its lowest. It records the footsteps of every deep collector, witnessing countless sleepless nights spent gathering treasures. To own it is to possess the highest honor in the collecting world."
description_schinese: "只有在服务器负载最低的深夜时分才会显现的神秘徽记。它记录着每一位深度收藏家的足迹，见证了无数个通宵收集珍品的不眠之夜。拥有它，就是拥有了收藏界的最高荣誉。"

name: Eternal Ice Crystal
description: "A mysterious crystal excavated from the depths of an ancient glacier, sealing within it the power of ice unmelted for a millennium. Those who touch it feel a coolness spread throughout their body, and under moonlight, it emits a mysterious pale blue glow. Every facet is flawless, as if time itself has been frozen."
description_schinese: "从远古冰川深处挖掘出的神秘水晶，内部封存着千年不化的寒冰之力。触碰它的人会感受到一股清凉传遍全身，在月光下散发出淡蓝色的神秘光芒。每一个面都完美无瑕，仿佛凝固了时间本身。"

name: Frost Amulet
description: "A mysterious amulet woven by snow spirits, covered in frost patterns that never melt. Delicate silver lines weave into complex geometric patterns, with every detail radiating a pure beauty."
description_schinese: "由冰雪精灵亲手编织的神秘护符，表面覆盖着永不融化的霜花纹路。精致的银色线条交织成复杂的几何图案，每个细节都散发着纯净的美感。"

name: Blazing Core
description: "The legendary Heart of Flame guarded by dragons, containing the world's purest fire elemental energy. Even when static, one can feel the intense vitality burning within. Golden-red light radiates outward from the core, forming a brilliant aura effect."
description_schinese: "传说中龙族守护的火焰之心，蕴含着世界上最纯粹的火元素能量。即使在静态中，依然能感受到其内在的炽热生命力。金红色的光芒从核心向外辐射，形成绚烂的光环效果。"

name: Phoenix Feather
description: "A precious feather left behind during the phoenix's rebirth, emitting a warm golden-red glow. Every fiber shines like gold, with a delicate and layered texture, symbolizing eternal beauty and resurrection."
description_schinese: "不死鸟涅槃重生时留下的珍贵羽毛，散发着温暖的金红色光芒。每一根纤维都如黄金般闪耀，羽毛的纹理细腻而富有层次感，象征着永恒的美与重生。"

name: Shard of Mjolnir
description: "A sacred shard scattered to the mortal realm after the breaking of the Thunder God's hammer, covered in ancient runes. Electric blue veins flash within the dark grey metallic texture, and every crack tells a story of epic battles."
description_schinese: "雷神战锤破碎后散落人间的神圣碎片，表面刻满了古老的符文。深灰色的金属质感中闪烁着电蓝色的纹路，每一道裂痕都述说着史诗般的战斗故事。"

name: Eye of the Storm
description: "A purple vortex of lightning swirls eternally within this transparent crystal orb, its surface smooth as a mirror. Even in a static state, the internal electric light flows slowly, creating a mysterious and spectacular visual effect."
description_schinese: "透明的水晶球内永远旋转着紫色的雷电漩涡，球体表面光滑如镜。即使在静止状态下，内部的电光依然在缓缓流动，营造出神秘而壮观的视觉效果。"

name: Emerald Viper Eye
description: "The fossilized eye of an ancient serpent king, emitting an alluring yet mysterious emerald green glow. The oval gem's surface is mirror-smooth, and a deep pupil within seems to gaze back at the observer—beauty with a hint of dangerous charm."
description_schinese: "古老毒蛇王的眼珠化石，散发着诱人却神秘的翡翠绿光。椭圆形的宝石表面光滑如镜，内部似乎有深邃的瞳孔在凝视着观者，美丽中透着一丝危险的魅力。"

name: Venomous Vase
description: "An ancient vase containing a mysterious purple liquid, its body carved with exquisite vine patterns. The purple fluid flows slowly within, refracting a captivating light. The black vase creates a striking visual contrast against the purple liquid."
description_schinese: "装着神秘紫色液体的古老花瓶，瓶身雕刻着精美的藤蔓图案。紫色的液体在瓶中缓缓流动，折射出迷人的光芒。黑色的瓶身与紫色液体形成强烈的视觉对比。"

name: Throne of Glacial Ice
description: "The legendary throne of the Frost Queen, meticulously carved from eternal polar ice. Every detail is flawless, with lifelike ice dragon reliefs carved into the armrests. The seat displays a deep ice blue, as if the northern lights are dancing within. The entire throne radiates supreme majesty and pure beauty."
description_schinese: "传说中冰霜女王的专属王座，由万年不化的极地玄冰精心雕琢而成。王座的每一个细节都完美无瑕，扶手上雕刻着栩栩如生的冰龙浮雕。坐垫部分呈现出深邃的冰蓝色，仿佛能看到北极光在其中舞动。整个王座散发着至高无上的威严与纯净之美。"

name: Crown of the Sun God
description: "A sacred crown worn by the ancient Sun God himself, cast from pure gold and flame gemstones. Designed in a radial pattern, twelve golden rays extend outward, each tipped with a fiery red divine stone. The central sun emblem dazzles like the actual sun, and the whole piece radiates a holy and majestic golden brilliance."
description_schinese: "古代太阳神亲自佩戴的神圣王冠，由纯金和火焰宝石铸造而成。王冠呈放射状设计，十二道金色光芒向四周延展，每道光芒的顶端都镶嵌着一颗火红色的神石。中央的太阳徽章如真正的太阳般璀璨夺目，整体散发着神圣而威严的金色光辉。"

name: Tome of Thunder
description: "A mysterious ancient tome recording the thunder laws of creation, its cover made from lightning-struck sacred wood and etched with flickering electric runes. The pages are crafted from special lightning crystals, transparent as glass yet tough as steel. Whenever a page is turned, purple lightning dances between the lines, as if the power of thunder is eternally sealed within the text."
description_schinese: "记录着世界创始雷霆法则的神秘古书，封面由雷击神木制成，表面刻满了闪烁的电光符文。书页由特殊的雷电水晶制成，透明如玻璃却坚韧如钢。每当翻开书页时，都能看到紫色的电光在字里行间跳跃舞动，仿佛雷电的力量被永远封存在了文字之中。"

name: Abyssal Poison Lotus
description: "A legendary flower growing in the depths of the abyss, displaying an alluring deep purple throughout, with petals edged in a mysterious green fluorescence. Seven layers of petals unfold progressively, each with a different gradient of purple. A mysterious liquid resembling liquid emerald flows in the stamen; the flower radiates a deadly yet beautiful charm. It is said to be the most beautiful and dangerous flower in the world."
description_schinese: "生长于地狱深渊的传说之花，通体呈现诱人的深紫色，花瓣边缘泛着神秘的绿色荧光。七层花瓣层层递进，每一层都有着不同深浅的紫色渐变。花蕊中央流淌着如液态翡翠般的神秘液体，整朵花散发着致命却美丽的魅力。据说这是世界上最美也最危险的花朵。"

name: Quantum CPU
description: A processor chip manufactured using advanced quantum entanglement technology, its surface shimmering with a blue quantum halo. Microscopic views reveal millions of quantum gates working simultaneously, each performing parallel calculations that transcend traditional computing.
description_schinese: 采用最先进的量子纠缠技术制造的处理器芯片，表面闪烁着蓝色的量子光晕。微观视角下可以看到数以百万计的量子门在同时工作，每一个都在进行着超越传统计算的并行运算。

name: GPU
description: A processor chip manufactured using advanced quantum entanglement technology, its surface shimmering with a blue quantum halo. Microscopic views reveal millions of quantum gates working simultaneously, each performing parallel calculations that transcend traditional computing.
description_schinese: 采用最先进的量子纠缠技术制造的处理器芯片，表面闪烁着蓝色的量子光晕。微观视角下可以看到数以百万计的量子门在同时工作，每一个都在进行着超越传统计算的并行运算。

name: Neural Network Processing Unit
description: A dedicated processor designed to mimic the structure of human brain neurons, featuring a golden circuit board densely packed with bionic neuron nodes. When active, it displays a pulse-like light flow effect, symbolizing the power of intelligent computing.
description_schinese: 模仿人类大脑神经元结构设计的专用处理器，金色的电路板上密布着仿生神经元节点。在运行时会呈现出如脉冲般的光流效果，象征着智能计算的力量。

name: Power Supply Unit
description: Antimatter energy encapsulated within a magnetic field container, emitting a pure white energy halo. This ultimate energy source provides near-infinite power to the server, with complex energy stabilization runes flowing across the spherical container's surface.
description_schinese: 封装在磁场容器中的反物质能源，散发着纯白色的能量光晕。这种终极能源能够为服务器提供近乎无限的动力支持，球形容器表面流动着复杂的能量稳定符文。

name: Micro-Fusion Reactor Module
description: An energy module that miniaturizes the fusion reaction of a stellar core, with orange-red plasma continuously reacting within a transparent container. The cooling fins on the surface emit a pale blue glow, representing vast, controlled energy.
description_schinese: 将恒星核心的聚变反应微缩化的能源模块，橙红色的等离子体在透明容器中持续反应。表面的冷却鳍片散发着淡蓝色的辉光，代表着受控的巨大能量。

name: Storage Matrix Unit
description: Utilizing lab-grown perfect diamonds as storage media, data is inscribed at the atomic level. Rainbow-colored data points flicker inside the transparent crystal, where each point represents terabytes of stored information.
description_schinese: 使用人工培育的完美钻石作为存储介质，在原子层级刻录数据。透明的晶体内部闪烁着彩虹般的数据光点，每一个光点都代表着TB级的信息存储。

name: Holographic Storage Matrix
description: A holographic storage device that uses laser interference technology to store data in three-dimensional space. A green holographic projection grid floats inside the cube, with data flowing through the space as light.
description_schinese: 用激光干涉技术将数据存储在三维空间中的全息存储设备。立方体内部悬浮着绿色的全息投影网格，数据以光的形式在空间中流动。

name: FTL Communication Repeater
description: A quantum entanglement communication device that breaks the light-speed barrier, enabling zero-latency data transmission. The device is surrounded by a purple quantum fluctuation ring, symbolizing the ability to connect across space and time.
description_schinese: 突破光速限制的量子纠缠通讯设备，能够实现零延迟的数据传输。设备表面环绕着紫色的量子波动光环，象征着跨越时空的连接能力。

name: Intelligent Control Unit
description: An autonomous learning core approaching true artificial intelligence, composed of countless nanoscale neurons. The core appears a deep purple-black, with golden currents of thought flowing across its surface. It is rumored to have begun developing a rudimentary self-consciousness.
description_schinese: 接近真正人工智能的自主学习核心，由无数纳米级神经元组成。核心呈现出深邃的紫黑色，表面流动着金色的思维电流。据说它已经开始产生初级的自我意识。

name: Deep Learning Accelerator
description: A super-accelerator designed specifically for deep neural network training, inlaid with thousands of miniature tensor processing cores. At full load, it displays a gradient blue-green light effect, like the flow of wisdom itself.
description_schinese: 专为深度神经网络训练设计的超级加速器，表面镶嵌着数千个微型张量处理核心。在满载运行时会呈现出渐变的蓝绿色光效，如同智慧之光在流淌。

name: Quantum Encryption Shield
description: The ultimate security system based on quantum key distribution technology, featuring a translucent hexagonal shield emitting a cyan quantum glow. Any attempt to crack it causes a collapse of the quantum state, leading to immediate detection.
description_schinese: 基于量子密钥分发技术的终极安全防护系统，半透明的六边形护盾散发着青色的量子光芒。任何试图破解的行为都会导致量子态坍缩，从而被立即检测。
